To make a cookie sandwich, start by making a batch of your favorite cookie dough. Roll out the dough and cut out circles using a cookie cutter. Bake the cookies according to the recipe instructions. Once the cookies are cooled, spread a layer of your favorite filling between two cookies and enjoy!
To make a cookie sandwich, simply spread your desired filling (such as buttercream, jam, or peanut butter) between two cookies of the same size and shape.
